comparison: Brunschwig Liber de arte distillandi (1500) vs Voynich Structural Findings

brunschwig.phase_ordering: DOCUMENTED - temperature sequence errors dominate warnings

hazard_topology.key_quote: The fourth degree should be avoided at all times...it would coerce the thing, which the art of true distillation rejects

control_granularity.key_quote: Applied to the water bath, the first degree was lukewarm, the second noticeably warm, the third almost seething, and the fourth destructively warm
control_granularity.notes: 40 vs 49 classes - structural parallel but not exact match

recovery_architecture.key_quote: may happen no more than twice
recovery_architecture.notes: Exact structural parallel - limited retry, cooling recovery

material_apparatus_separation.key_quote: Part 1 introduces ten distillation processes...but does not reference specific plants
material_apparatus_separation.notes: Same architectural decision - apparatus logic is material-agnostic

pedagogical_structure.key_quote: The text assumes minimal prior knowledge: it begins with brick-making and furnace construction
pedagogical_structure.notes: INFORMATIVE mismatch - different competency levels in same craft

sensory_modalities.key_quote: Rose and lavender waters are discarded when their taste and scent have diminished

conclusion: SYSTEMATIC_MATCH - Brunschwig and Voynich share operational architecture for distillation control
